description: Retrieves the history for the specified alarm. You can filter the results by date range or item type. If an alarm name is not specified, the histories for either all metric alarms or all composite alarms are returned. CloudWatch retains the history of an alarm even if you delete the alarm. To use this operation and return information about a composite alarm, you must be signed on with the cloudwatch:DescribeAlarmHistory permission that is scoped to *. You can't return information about composite alarms if your cloudwatch:DescribeAlarmHistory permission has a narrower scope.

parameters.name: AlarmTypes
parameters.description: Use this parameter to specify whether you want the operation to return metric alarms or composite alarms. If you omit this parameter, only metric alarms are returned. (string) ---

nested_items.name: AlarmHistoryItems
nested_items.description: The alarm histories, in JSON format.

nested_items.name: AlarmName
nested_items.description: The descriptive name for the alarm.

nested_items.name: AlarmType
nested_items.description: The type of alarm, either metric alarm or composite alarm.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The time stamp for the alarm history item.

nested_items.name: HistoryItemType
nested_items.description: The type of alarm history item.

nested_items.name: HistorySummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the alarm history, in text format.

nested_items.name: HistoryData
nested_items.description: Data about the alarm, in JSON format.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that marks the start of the next batch of returned results.
